detaileddescription.para: The LD Application (LD) application detects if the vehicle is landed, free falling, had ground contact or flying.

listitem.para: The LD application reads various messages such as vehicle local position, actuator controls, control state, battery status, vehicle attitude, and manual control setpoint.
Determines if the vehicle is in free fall.
Determines if the vehicle has ground contact.
Determines if the vehicle has landed.
Sets and publishes vehicle land detected message.
